data.name: Estranged: Act II
data.detailed_description:
Estranged: Act II follows the story of a fisherman, stranded on a mysterious island during a violent storm.

The game continues after the events of Estranged: Act I, which followed our hero's adventure in a search for a way to get home.

Experience what the island has in store as you uncover the secretive Arque Corporation, burrowing ever deeper into their dangerous and haphazard operations.

Key Features

  • Adventure game with puzzle elements
  • Immersive story driven environments
  • Unique characters and narrative
  • Familiar first person shooter gameplay

data.short_description:
Estranged: Act II follows the story of a fisherman, stranded on a mysterious island during a violent storm.

The game continues after the events of Estranged: Act I, which followed our hero's adventure in a search for a way to get home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit and above, fully updated
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470 or Radeon 6870 HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible card
  • Additional Notes: Requires newer hardware than Act I

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan or above
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Nvidia or AMD Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must support Metal: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT205073
